about_the_game:
McCarran International Airport, renamed Harry Reid International Airport in Feb. 2021 (IATA: LAS, ICAO: KLAS, FAA LID: LAS) and it has four runways and two passenger terminals.

In February 2021, the Clark County Commission unanimously approved the renaming of McCarran International Airport to Harry Reid International Airport, after the retired Nevada senator.

Features:

  • SAM animated jetways (SAM3 is required, free plugin)
  • High resolution edited USGS orthophoto covering the airport, the Las Vegas strip and surrounding area
  • Custom terrain mesh
  • Custom lighting
  • Custom ground textures with specular reflections
  • Custom ground lines, runway markings, and detail textures
  • High quality PBR building textures with night lighting
detailed_description:
McCarran International Airport, renamed Harry Reid International Airport in Feb. 2021 (IATA: LAS, ICAO: KLAS, FAA LID: LAS) and it has four runways and two passenger terminals.

In February 2021, the Clark County Commission unanimously approved the renaming of McCarran International Airport to Harry Reid International Airport, after the retired Nevada senator.

Features:

  • SAM animated jetways (SAM3 is required, free plugin)
  • High resolution edited USGS orthophoto covering the airport, the Las Vegas strip and surrounding area
  • Custom terrain mesh
  • Custom lighting
  • Custom ground textures with specular reflections
  • Custom ground lines, runway markings, and detail textures

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: Multi Core processor with 3,2G Hz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Optional: Free SAM plugin is required for the animated gates

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS (Mojave+)
  • Processor: Multi Core processor with 3,2G Hz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Optional: Free SAM plugin is required for the animated gates
